item.title: 波音国防工人坚持要求更好的协议，导致战斗机生产闲置
item.description: 周四，机械师工会的高级官员和一位民主党国会议员在圣路易斯附近的波音防务工厂外加入了罢工工人的行列，向波音公司施压，要求签订一份更接近于与西雅图地区工人达成的协议的合同。【原文：Top machinists union officials and a Democratic congressman joined striking workers outside a Boeing Defense facility near St. Louis on Thursday, pressing the company for a contract closer to an agreement reached with its Seattle-area workers.】

item.title: 亚洲股市波动，美元持稳，交易员等待鲍威尔讲话
item.description: 亚洲股市周五开盘震荡走高，因为焦虑的交易员们在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在杰克逊霍尔年度研讨会上的讲话。【原文：Stocks in Asia edged higher in a shaky start on Friday as anxious traders awaited a speech from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell at the annual Jackson Hole symposium.】

item.title: 独家报道公司称 OpenAI 首席人事官将离职
item.description: OpenAI 公司周四告诉路透社，公司首席人事官朱莉娅-维拉格拉（Julia Villagra）将于周五离职。【原文：OpenAI's chief people officer, Julia Villagra, is leaving the company ON Friday, the company told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联航称墨西哥将向美国航空公司返还资本航班时段
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）在周四公布的一份文件中称，墨西哥官员在 8 月 18 日的一次通话中通知几家美国航空公司，墨西哥城主要机场被削减的机位将归还给他们。【原文：Mexican officials informed several U.S. airlines in an August 18 call that slots that had been cut at Mexico City's main airport will be returned to them, United Airlines said in a filing made public on Thursday.】

item.title: 信息》称英伟达在中国发布指令后下令停止 H20 芯片生产
item.description: 据《The Information》周四援引两位直接知情人士的话报道，英伟达（Nvidia）已通知其部分零部件供应商暂停与H20相关的生产工作，H20是英伟达为中国市场量身定制的人工智能芯片。【原文：Nvidia has told some of its component suppliers to suspend production work related to H20, its AI chip tailor-made for the Chinese market, The Information reported on Thursday, citing two people with direct knowledge of the communications.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特朗普政府无意入股增加美国投资的公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引一位政府官员的话报道，特朗普政府正在考虑入股那些从 2022 年 CHIPS 法案中获得资金的公司，但并不打算入股那些正在增加美国投资的大型半导体公司。【原文：The Trump administration is considering taking equity stakes in companies receiving funds from the 2022 CHIPS Act but has no plans to seek shares in bigger semiconductor firms that are increasing their U.S. investments, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing a government official.】

item.title: 墨西哥快餐连锁店 Guzman Y Gomez 年度利润超出预期
item.description: 墨西哥快餐连锁店 Guzman Y Gomez（GYG）周五公布的年度净利润好于预期，并宣布首次派发股息。【原文：Mexican fast-food chain Guzman Y Gomez (GYG) reported a better-than-expected annual net profit and declared its first-ever dividend on Friday, driven by solid sales of its popular breakfast menu across key markets, particularly in Australia.】

item.title: 新西兰央行经济学家称，新西兰企业将习惯全球不确定性
item.description: 新西兰中央银行首席经济学家周五表示，全球不确定性对新西兰信心造成的打击将随着企业适应经济政策高度不可预测性的时期而逐渐消退。【原文：The hit to New Zealand confidence caused by global uncertainty will fade as businesses get used to a time of heightened economic policy unpredictability, the chief economist at the country’s central bank said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国国防部将购买高达 5 亿美元的钴
item.description: 美国正在寻求采购价值高达 5 亿美元的钴，用于国防储备，同时美国也在采取行动增加其关键矿产供应。【原文：The U.S. is seeking to procure cobalt worth up to $500 million for defense stockpiles amid the country's move to boost its critical mineral supplies.】

item.title: 韩国转向文化寻找下一个增长动力
item.description: 在传统制造商面临越来越多的保护主义壁垒之际，亚洲第四大经济体将赌注押在了文化出口上。【原文：South Korean entertainment companies riding the Korean Wave, or Hallyu, are scrambling to widen their global reach as Asia's fourth-largest economy bets on cultural exports at a time of growing protectionist barriers for traditional manufacturers.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Meta 与谷歌签署了价值 100 多亿美元的云计算协议
item.description: 据《The Information》周四援引两位知情人士的话报道，谷歌已与 Meta Platforms 达成一项价值超过 100 亿美元的大型云计算交易。【原文：Google has struck a major cloud computing deal worth more than $10 billion with Meta Platforms , The Information reported on Thursday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Workday 季度订阅收入预期令人失望
item.description: Workday 周四上调了年度订阅收入预期，但对本季度的展望与预期一致，导致这家人力资源软件供应商的股价在盘后交易中下跌近 4%。【原文：Workday raised its annual subscription revenue forecast on Thursday, but an in-line outlook for the current quarter sent the human resources software provider's shares down nearly 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国卫生部网站显示，透析公司DaVita遭勒索软件攻击，270万人受影响
item.description: 美国卫生部网站周四显示，勒索软件攻击加密了透析公司 DaVita 网络的某些内容，影响到 270 万人。【原文：A ransomware attack that encrypted certain elements of dialysis firm DaVita's network affected 2.7 million people, the U.S. health department's website showed on Thursday.】

item.title: Pinnacle Financial 和 Synovus 任命领导团队领导合并后的银行
item.description: Pinnacle Financial Partners 和 Synovus Financial 周四任命了负责监管合并后银行的高管领导团队，这两家地区性贷款机构正在为明年初交易完成后的新篇章做准备。【原文：Pinnacle Financial Partners and Synovus Financial on Thursday named the executive leadership team to oversee the combined bank, as the regional lenders prepare for a new chapter after the deal closes early next year.】

item.title: 购物者追捧折扣服装，罗斯百货季度利润超预期
item.description: 罗斯百货公司（Ross Stores）周四公布的季度利润超过预期，并恢复了年度盈利预测，该公司押注于折扣服装和配饰的需求，因为关税会在假日季节提高零售价格。【原文：Ross Stores on Thursday topped quarterly profit estimates and reinstated its annual earnings forecast, betting on demand for discounted apparel and accessories as tariffs raise retail prices during the holiday season.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯造访墨西哥土著小镇，为凉鞋设计道歉
item.description: 阿迪达斯高管周四访问了墨西哥南部山区的一个原住民小镇，就墨西哥政府抨击为文化挪用的凉鞋设计表示道歉。【原文：Adidas executives visited a small Indigenous town in the mountains of southern Mexico on Thursday to offer an apology over a sandal-inspired shoe design that Mexico's government had blasted as cultural appropriation.】

item.title: Cracker Barrel 因更换标识风波股价大跌
item.description: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store 不断尝试对其品牌进行改造，但这一尝试引发了反弹，并引发了抛售，导致该餐饮连锁店今年迄今为止的大部分股价涨幅化为乌有。【原文：An ongoing attempt by Cracker Barrel Old Country Store to revamp its brand triggered a backlash and unleashed a selloff that wiped out most of the dining chain's year-to-date stock price gains.】

item.title: 交易日 美联储押注下滑，鲍威尔登场
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 新西兰恒天然集团将以 22 亿美元向 Lactalis 出售消费者业务
item.description: 新西兰恒天然合作社集团（Fonterra Co-operative Group）周五表示，将以38.45亿新西兰元（约合22.4亿美元）的价格向法国乳业巨头拉克塔利斯（Lactalis）出售其全球消费者及相关业务。【原文：New Zealand's Fonterra Co-operative Group will sell its global consumer and associated businesses to French dairy giant Lactalis for NZ$3.845 billion ($2.24 billion), the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 在利基小麦期货市场，重新启动的传统合约抵御了巨头对手的新产品
item.description: 在农产品期货市场的一个小角落里，一个已经交易了 140 多年的传统春小麦合约正在抵御全球最大的期货交易所芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）今年春季推出的竞争合约的挑战。【原文：In a head-to-head contest in a small corner of agricultural futures markets, a legacy spring wheat contract that has traded for more than 140 years is fending off a challenge from a competing contract launched this spring by CME Group, the world's largest futures exchange.】

item.title: 人工智能工具需求强劲，Zoom Communications上调年度预测
item.description: 周四，中兴通讯（Zoom Communications）上调了年度营收和利润预期，这主要得益于混合型工作趋势以及人工智能技术与产品的融合，使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 4.5%。【原文：Zoom Communications raised its annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, banking on hybrid work trends and the integration of artificial intelligence technology into its products, sending its shares up 4.5% in extended trading.】

item.title: Intuit 预测第一季度收入增长低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: Intuit 周四预测第一季度营收增长低于分析师预期，这表明其营销平台 Mailchimp 表现低迷，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌近 6%。【原文：Intuit forecast first-quarter revenue growth below analysts' estimates on Thursday, a sign of sluggish performance at its marketing platform Mailchimp, sending its shares down nearly 6% in extended trading.】

item.title: 萨斯喀彻温省省长将赴中国讨论油菜籽关税问题
item.description: 加拿大西部萨斯喀彻温省省长斯科特-莫伊（Scott Moe）周四表示，他将前往中国，就说服中国政府放弃对油菜籽征收新关税一事进行会谈。【原文：Scott Moe, premier of the western Canadian province of Saskatchewan, said on Thursday that he would travel to Chinasoon for talks on persuading Beijing to drop its new tariffs on canola.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，NBC 环球公司与美国职业棒球联盟（MLB）即将达成为期三年、金额接近 6 亿美元的协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，康卡斯特旗下的 NBC 环球公司正在与美国职业棒球大联盟（Major League Baseball）进行深入谈判，双方将在 NBC 和孔雀流媒体服务上转播比赛，协议为期三年，年收入接近 2 亿美元。【原文：Comcast-owned NBCUniversal is in advanced talks with Major League Baseball to carry games on NBC and the Peacock streaming service in a three-year deal approaching $200 million annually, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普签署行政命令，设立首席设计官职位
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四签署了一项行政命令，成立国家设计工作室，并设立首席设计官一职，以帮助改善联邦数字和实体服务的 "可用性和美观性"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday signed an executive order to establish a National Design Studio and create the role of a chief design officer to help improve the "usability and aesthetics" of Federal digital and physical services.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Aspiration Partners 的联合创始人承认欺诈投资者
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，由演员小罗伯特-唐尼（Robert Downey Jr.）和莱昂纳多-迪卡普里奥（Leonardo DiCaprio）支持的一家金融科技公司（原名为Aspiration Partners Inc）的联合创始人已承认在一项2.48亿美元的计划中欺诈投资者和贷款人。【原文：The co-founder of a fintech firm formerly known as Aspiration Partners Inc, and which was backed by actors Robert Downey Jr. and Leonardo DiCaprio, has pleaded guilty to defrauding investors and lenders in a $248 million scheme, the U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普正考虑将《CHIPS 法案》中的 20 亿美元资金用于关键矿产
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，特朗普政府正在考虑一项计划，从《CHIPS 法案》中重新分配至少 20 亿美元，用于资助关键矿产项目，并增强商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）对战略部门的影响力。【原文：The Trump administration is considering a plan to reallocate at least $2 billion from the CHIPS Act to fund critical minerals projects and boost Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick's influence over the strategic sector, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会任命玛格丽特-瑞安为执法处处长
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周四任命玛格丽特-瑞安（Margaret Ryan）为该机构执法部门主管。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday named Margaret Ryan as the director of the agency's enforcement division.】

item.title: 美国司法部将撤销以加密货币为后盾的资金转移案件
item.description: 美国司法部的一位官员周四表示，美国司法部不打算针对那些在没有犯罪意图的情况下创建用于传输加密货币的去中心化平台的软件开发商。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department does not plan to target software developers that create decentralized platforms for transmitting cryptocurrencies without criminal intent, a Justice official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴拿马穆里诺公司大规模裁员后将推动金吉达回归，并抨击诉讼威胁
item.description: 巴拿马总统何塞-劳尔-穆里诺周四抨击了有关可能对香蕉巨头金吉达公司提起诉讼的报道。【原文：Panama's President Jose Raul Mulino on Thursday blasted reports of a possible lawsuit against banana giant Chiquita, which fired all its local day workers due to a strike, as he prepares to negotiate the firm's return to the country next week.】
